message.empty: Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}?
message.mustBeEmpty: The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest?
message.mustBeEmptyProceed: The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items?
message.cannotBeDeleted: The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted.
